sqlMap.select: SELECT wms.id, wms.goods_id, wms.wms_goods_id, wms.goods_supplier, wms.goods_sname, wms.total_num, wms.left_num, wms.is_be_delivery FROM jeehe_inventory_wms wms WHERE wms.wms_goods_id =#wmsGoodsId:VARCHAR#

SELECT supp.id, supp.goods_id, supp.suppliers_id, supp.total_num, supp.left_num, supp.limit_storage, supp.attach_sale
FROM jeehe_inventory_suppliers supp WHERE supp.goods_id = #goodsId:BIGINT#
supp.suppliers_id = #suppliersId:INTEGER#

SELECT sel.id, sel.goods_id, IFNULL(sel.suppliers_id,0) AS suppliers_id, sel.good_type_id, sel.total_num, sel.left_num, IFNULL(sel.suppliers_sub_id,0) AS suppliers_sub_id, IFNULL(sel.suppliers_inventory_id,0) AS suppliers_inventory_id, sel.limit_storage, sel.attach_sale, sel.wms_goods_id FROM jeehe_inventory_selection sel where sel.id = #selectionId:BIGINT#

SELECT ga.goods_id, ga.goods_base_id, ga.goods_wms_id, ga.good_selection_ids, ga.add_goods_selection, ga.direct_consumption, ga.total_num, ga.left_num, ga.goods_sale_count, ga.limit_storage, ga.attach_sale FROM jeehe_inventory_attribute ga where ga.goods_id = #goodsId:BIGINT#

SELECT CASE wms.is_be_delivery WHEN 0 THEN 'wowo' WHEN 1 THEN 'shangjia' END is_be_delivery, CASE wms.is_be_delivery WHEN 0 THEN '窝窝发货' WHEN 1 THEN '商家发货' END description FROM jeehe_inventory_wms wms WHERE wms.wms_goods_id = #wmsGoodsId:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.update:
update jeehe_inventory_selection
total_num = total_num + #totalNum:INTEGER#
left_num = left_num + #leftNum:INTEGER#
where good_type_id = #goodTypeId:BIGINT#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT wms.id, wms.wms_goods_id, wms.goods_supplier, wms.goods_sname, wms.total_num, wms.left_num, wms.is_be_delivery
FROM jeehe_goods_wms wms WHERE wms.wms_goods_id = #wmsGoodsId:VARCHAR#
is_be_delivery = #isBeDelivery:INTEGER#

SELECT wms.id, wms.wms_goods_id, wms.goods_supplier, wms.goods_sname, wms.total_num, wms.left_num, wms.is_be_delivery FROM jeehe_goods_attribute ga,jeehe_goods_wms wms where ga.goods_wms_id = wms.id AND ga.goods_id = #goodsId:BIGINT#
sqlMap.update:
update jeehe_inventory_wms
goods_supplier = #goodsSupplier:VARCHAR#
goods_sname = #goodsName:VARCHAR#
total_num = #totalNumber:INTEGER#
left_num = #leftNumber:INTEGER#
is_be_delivery = #isBeDelivery:INTEGER#
where wms_goods_id = #wmsGoodsId:VARCHAR#
is_be_delivery = #isBeDelivery:INTEGER#

update jeehe_inventory_suppliers
total_num = #totalNumber:INTEGER#
left_num = #leftNumber:INTEGER#
attach_sale = #waterfloodVal:INTEGER#
where suppliers_id = #suppliersId:INTEGER#

update jeehe_inventory_selection
suppliers_id = #suppliersId:BIGINT#
good_type_id = #goodTypeId:INTEGER#
total_num = #totalNumber:INTEGER#
left_num = #leftNumber:INTEGER#
attach_sale = #waterfloodVal:INTEGER#
suppliers_sub_id = #suppliersSubId:INTEGER#
suppliers_inventory_id = #suppliersInventoryId:INTEGER#
wms_goods_id = #wmsGoodsId:VARCHAR#
goods_id = #goodsId:BIGINT#
limit_storage = #limitStorage:INTEGER#
where id = #id:INTEGER#
sqlMap.insert: insert into jeehe_inventory_selection (id, goods_id, suppliers_id, good_type_id, total_num, left_num, limit_storage, attach_sale, suppliers_sub_id, suppliers_inventory_id, wms_goods_id ) values ( #id:BIGINT#, #goodsId:BIGINT#, #suppliersId:BIGINT#, #goodTypeId:INTEGER#, #totalNumber:INTEGER#, #leftNumber:INTEGER#, #limitStorage:INTEGER#, #waterfloodVal:INTEGER#, #suppliersSubId:INTEGER#, #suppliersInventoryId:INTEGER#, #wmsGoodsId:VARCHAR# )
sqlMap.update:
update jeehe_inventory_attribute
goods_base_id = #goodsBaseId:BIGINT#
goods_sale_count = #goodsSaleCount:INTEGER#
total_num = #totalNumber:INTEGER#
left_num = #leftNumber:INTEGER#
good_selection_ids = #goodsSelectionIds:VARCHAR#
goods_wms_id = #wmsId:BIGINT#
attach_sale = #waterfloodVal:INTEGER#
limit_storage = #limitStorage:INTEGER#
add_goods_selection = #isAddGoodsSelection:INTEGER#
direct_consumption = #isDirectConsumption:INTEGER#
where goods_id = #goodsId:BIGINT#
sqlMap.insert: insert into jeehe_inventory_attribute ( goods_id, goods_base_id, goods_wms_id, good_selection_ids, total_num, left_num, limit_storage, add_goods_selection, direct_consumption, attach_sale, goods_sale_count ) values ( #goodsId:BIGINT#, #goodsBaseId:BIGINT#, #wmsId:BIGINT#, #goodsSelectionIds:VARCHAR#, #totalNumber:INTEGER#, #leftNumber:INTEGER#, #limitStorage:INTEGER#, #isAddGoodsSelection:INTEGER#, #isDirectConsumption:INTEGER#, #waterfloodVal:INTEGER#, #goodsSaleCount:INTEGER# )

insert ignore into jeehe_inventory_log (id, goods_base_id, goods_id, order_id, user_id, business_type, item, create_time, inventory_vara, original_inventory, opt_type, content, system, client_ip, remark) values (#id:BIGINT#, #goodsBaseId:BIGINT#, #goodsId:BIGINT#, #orderId:BIGINT#, #userId:BIGINT#, #businessType:VARCHAR#, #item:VARCHAR#, #createTime:INTEGER#, #inventoryChange:VARCHAR#, #originalInventory:VARCHAR#, #actionType:VARCHAR#, #content:VARCHAR#, #clientName:VARCHAR#, #clientIp:VARCHAR#, #remark:VARCHAR#)
insert into jeehe_inventory_base ( goods_base_id, base_sale_count, base_total_count ) values ( #goodsBaseId:BIGINT#, #baseSaleCount:INTEGER#, #baseTotalCount:INTEGER# )
sqlMap.select: SELECT gb.goods_base_id, gb.base_sale_count, gb.base_total_count FROM jeehe_inventory_base gb where gb.goods_base_id = #goodsBaseId:BIGINT#

SELECT g.goods_base_id ,IFNULL(SUM(sale_count),0) AS base_sale_count,IFNULL(SUM(ga.total_num),0) AS base_total_count FROM jeehe_goods_attribute ga, jeehe_goods g WHERE g.goods_id=ga.goods_id AND g.goods_base_id = #goodsBaseId:BIGINT#
SELECT goods_base_id ,IFNULL(SUM(base_sale_count),0) AS base_sale_count,IFNULL(SUM(base_total_count),0) AS base_total_count FROM jeehe_inventory_base WHERE goods_base_id = #goodsBaseId:BIGINT#
sqlMap.update:
update jeehe_inventory_attribute
goods_sale_count = goods_sale_count + #goodsSaleCount:INTEGER#
where goods_id = #goodsId:BIGINT#

update jeehe_inventory_base
base_sale_count = base_sale_count + #baseSaleCount:INTEGER#
where goods_base_id = #goodsBaseId:BIGINT#
